channel.title: [PI] God wars bosses won't attack
channel.description: As the title says, the god wars bosses won't attack me automatically when I enter their chamber.

item.title: [PI] God wars bosses won't attack
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:9, topic:445460”][quote author=Code kai link=topic=548239.msg4019402#msg4019402 date=1339897743]

is it actually reading the clicks? it might be a problem with your object distance

that’s the problem, it works for the zammy and bandos but not the rest. Any ideas?
[/quote]

I mean, sometimes the objects are too big, so when you click them it wont be read.[/quote]

Oh, I see :), how would I edit the object distance?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] God wars bosses won't attack
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Code kai, post:7, topic:445460”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=548239.msg4019388#msg4019388 date=1339896768]
is it actually reading the clicks? it might be a problem with your object distance
[/quote]

that’s the problem, it works for the zammy and bandos but not the rest. Any ideas? [/quote]

I mean, sometimes the objects are too big, so when you click them it wont be read.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] God wars bosses won't attack
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Code kai, post:5, topic:445460”]Fixed it! Now, do you guys know what the problem with these two codes are? (they’re the godwars prayer altars)

case 26288: if (c.prayer < c.maxPrayer()) { c.startAnimation(645); c.prayer = c.maxPrayer(); c.sendMessage("Armadyl grants protection upon you!"); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } else { c.sendMessage("You have no room to receive further protection!"); } break; case 26287: if (c.prayer < c.maxPrayer()) { c.startAnimation(645); c.prayer = c.maxPrayer(); c.sendMessage("Saradomin blesses a prayer upon you!"); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } else { c.sendMessage("You have no room to receive a blessing!"); } break;

I added the same exact codes for the other two cases with the bandos and zamorak altars, and they work flawlessly. What is the problem with these two?[/quote]
Make sure those are the right ids.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] God wars bosses won't attack
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

Fixed it! Now, do you guys know what the problem with these two codes are? (they’re the godwars prayer altars)

case 26288: if (c.prayer < c.maxPrayer()) { c.startAnimation(645); c.prayer = c.maxPrayer(); c.sendMessage("Armadyl grants protection upon you!"); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } else { c.sendMessage("You have no room to receive further protection!"); } break; case 26287: if (c.prayer < c.maxPrayer()) { c.startAnimation(645); c.prayer = c.maxPrayer(); c.sendMessage("Saradomin blesses a prayer upon you!"); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); } else { c.sendMessage("You have no room to receive a blessing!"); } break;

I added the same exact codes for the other two cases with the bandos and zamorak altars, and they work flawlessly. What is the problem with these two?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] God wars bosses won't attack
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

So that area isn’t set as multi inside your NPC.java

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] God wars bosses won't attack
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

They only attack one at a time, though they are aggressive.
